item.title: Coming Soon
item.description: Coming Soon I'm currently in the process of categorizing and documenting my more recent projects that I've been working on. For now, here are some function excerpts from some of those endeavors as a sample: AWS Parallelization: parallelization: Uses multiprocessing library to execute boto3 calls across accounts def parallelization(data, function, service, resource, region, accnt_subset, env_set=False, dry_run=False): if len(data) < 2: print("\nERROR: Length of account IDs is 1. Please use this script for parallel actions across " "multiple accounts and confirm you are selecting a verified account list.
